divs: Sighting DetailsHey, This event just happened. I went outside to try and catch our bird which flew out of its cage and into a tree. As soon as we got out i saw a HUGE light fall from the sky and it reached the ground before vanishing. I thought it was a meteor or something until i noticed another light in the distance. I thought it was a really bright star or something. About 5 minutes later i noticed that the light moved about 1cm to the left. I wasn't paying full attention to it as i was trying to get my bird down. Finally about 15 minutes later, I saw the light has moved backwards. I decided to walk out the front to see it. When i got out the front the light was gone. It wasn't cloudy or anything.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Brisbane
There were no other sightings in Brisbane on or around April 14th 2010
Summary: Massive Meteor Light Falling Then huge light in sky for 10 mintutes moving around.
